itunesq

Class TracksWindow

  • Object
    • TracksWindow

  • public class TracksWindow
extends Object
    Class that handles the display tracks window. This window shows all tracks or a set of tracks resulting from a query.
    Author:
    Jon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TracksWindow.QueryType
      The type of query associated with the list of tracks.

    • Method Detail

      • displayTracks

        public void displayTracks(Display display,
                          List<Track> tracks,
                          TracksWindow.QueryType queryType,
                          String queryStr)
                   throws IOException,
                          SerializationException
        Displays the tracks in a new window.
        Parameters:
        display - display object for managing windows
        tracks - list of tracks to be displayed
        queryType - type of query (if any) that generated the tracks to be displayed
        queryStr - string representation of the query, or null
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs trying to read the BXML file.
        SerializationException - If an error occurs trying to deserialize the BXML file.

      • handleTrackDetailsPopup

        public void handleTrackDetailsPopup(Map<String,String> trackRowData,
                                    Display display,
                                    Window owningWindow)
                             throws IOException,
                                    SerializationException
        Creates the track info details dialog.

        This is called when the user right clicks on a track in a table view, for example the filtered tracks window, or the list of tracks in a selected playlist.

        Parameters:
        trackRowData - map of the track data from the table view row that was clicked
        display - display for opening the dialog
        owningWindow - window that owns the track info dialog
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs trying to read the BXML file.
        SerializationException - If an error occurs trying to deserialize the BXML file.

      • getFilteredTrackData

        public List<HashMap<String,String>> getFilteredTrackData()
        Gets the list of tracks table data for a filtered list of tracks.
        Returns:
        list of tracks table data
